name: Summum Aeterna
description: Aeterna Noctis is a challenging 2D hand-drawn action platformer, a Metroidvania with thrilling combat that will keep you on the edge of your seat and heart-stopping platform sections that will put your skills to the test. Become the King of Darkness in an epic journey through 16 connected areas.

name: Remedium
description: The fast-paced twin-stick shooter game in the grim post-apocalyptic Renaissance setting. It had been more than a hundred years since the terrible plague devoured the whole Europe and turned almost everyone there in the maddened mutants.

name: Wandering Sword
description: Wandering Sword is a Wuxia-style pixel RPG. Play as a young man from Liao City in the Outer Lands who is accidentally drawn into a feud between two rival sects. Being in the wrong place at a wrong time results in getting poisoned with the lethal Frozen Toad. However, you are fortunate enough to have Qingxu, Sect Leader of Wudang, come to your aid and save your life. This is your turning point: the moment you decide to become a great warrior and enter the land of the Central Plains.

name: Thunder Ray
description: Thunder Ray is Arcade-Boxing, Retro-like gameplay with blood and violence. Defeat all the best fighters in the galaxy to become the GOAT of the universe.

name: Dune: Spice Wars
description: Dune: Spice Wars is a real-time strategy game with 4X elements, from the developers of the critically acclaimed Northgard. Set in Frank Herbert’s groundbreaking Dune universe, you must lead your faction and battle for control and dominance over the harsh desert planet of Arrakis. Best your opponents through political intrigue, crush them in combat, and undermine them with your network of illusive spies.

name: Gazzlers
description: Gazzlers is an insane VR shooter full of diesel-fueled chaos! Embark on an epic train ride across the lands of Ginkgo. Build your ultimate weapon and shoot, block, and dodge your way through hordes of crazy enemies to reach the Temple of the Machine God.

name: Fading Afternoon
description: Seiji Maruyama is a middle-aged yakuza recently released from prison. Known as "Gozuki" (one of the demon generals from Buddhist mythology) he is the power that his oyabun counts on. But there is one thing his aniki is not taking into account: Maruyama is getting old.

name: Offroad Truck Simulator: Heavy Duty Challenge
description: Experience unparalleled offroad driving in Offroad Truck Simulator: Heavy Duty Challenge. Travel through the breathtaking landscapes of Utah's rugged terrain, delve into the dense European forests, and dominate diverse terrains in France, Poland, Austria, and Iceland. This game delivers an exhilarating off-road experience with an extensive fleet of massive and formidable trucks.

name: Railroads & Catacombs
description: Travel through this hostile land gone mad aboard your ancient train. Choose wisely where to stop for resources and supplies and try to survive in this original Turn-Based Roguelike Game. How far will you go?

name: Down & Out
description: Get ready for a truly immersive experience of surviving on the city streets to prove yourself as the toughest and meanest! Fight, make money, and become the king of the streets in our all-new VR game, Down & Out!

name: Green With Energy
description: A relaxing game where you become a power engineer and iteratively design, test and build power grid designs. Balance budget, efficiency, and environmental impact, across a variety of biomes and climates. Will you build resilient systems, or cobble something together with duct tape? It's your choice.

name: Paradiso Guardian
description: A metroidvania game heavily influenced by SOTN. Play as Lenga, the Battle Angel, going on a quest to reclaim the floating castle occupied by the Demon army!

name: AK-xolotl
description: The cutest, deadliest and only top-down roguelike shooter featuring AK-wielding axolotls. Blast your way through the animal kingdom with an arsenal of kick-ass guns, mighty power-ups and even raise an army of trigger-happy baby axolotls.

name: Ugly
description: Ugly is a psycho-dark fairy tale with new mechanics. You will have to swap the main character with his own reflection to solve puzzles, defeat bosses and discover all the secrets in a palace where nothing is what it seems.

name: Bus World
description: Bus World is a game about passenger transportations in various conditions, starting from standard days of a bus driver and ending with rescuing people who suffered from disasters.

name: Solace State
description: Can you retain your humanity while fighting against a corporate biotech conspiracy? Play as the young hacker Chloe who confronts political plots as she fights for her friends and her neighbors. Your choices in building up relationships and communities can revolutionize into hope or hostility.

name: Ad Infinitum
description: Ad Infinitum is an atmospheric single-player horror game, which puts you into a World War I setting seen through a first-person perspective. You find yourself in the trenches of a forlorn battlefield where your are being hunted by vicious creatures. Solve puzzles to clear pathways and sneak through trenches to hide from vicious creatures. Avoid dangerous threats and try to escape this world of pain and death. Besides the realistic graphics, the game features a stealth system, puzzle-solving and exploration of the vicious game world which all culminates in a subtle yet intense story.

name: The Last One and Then Another
description:
The Last and Then Another is a free standalone expansion to the narrative-driven experience HOW FISH IS MADE.

"Your eyes will be my mouth. My fins will be your tongue. More is more is more is more! Devour your smallness! Fill the void!"

name: The Dalton Affair
description:
The Dalton Affair is a VIP-exclusive short form special of the The Nanny Affair series.

It is a reimagining of The Nanny Affair series from Sam Dalton's point of view.

name: It Lives Within
description: You're finally ready to leave your past behind and move on. But apparently, moving on means enrolling at a community college in a supernatural town overflowing with monsters and dark magic...

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Collab 2023 - Round 1
description:
Welcome to Round 1 of the 2023 SRB2 Official Level Design Collab! The OLDC is a celebration of all the map creators in our community. This time around, it is also the introduction of UDMF to the event, unlocking unique new level creation possibilities.

Single Player​:

- Rigonemetis 33 - InferNOr

- Tectonic Bluffs Zone - TrustyGun

- Blue Mountain Zone - Avalice

- Tofu Thalweg Zone - RoyKirbs

- Frosty Pass Zone - JABSphere94

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Ninten Moveset
description: A mod which adds Ninten to Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, along with his moves from EarthBound Beginnings.

name: Banished
description:
"I… am… an OLD GOD…. long ago… I was trapped… Banished!... To another dimension… a thousand years, beyond reflections… however… the barrier has weakened… If only for a moment… long enough!... to consume!….

Will you consume your prey, or will you be trapped in the mirror world forever?Uncover the terrifying mysterious life of the monster from the mirror universe stalking and eating humans! 3 bone-chilling levels. Mirror world mechanic. Different NPC types.

The objective is to find the right moment to grab prey.

Plan your attack, but don't forget to improvise. Travelling through the real world drains your hunger. Eat humans to restore hunger and grow strong enough to reach the next level. Beware! Alerted humans give chase on sight and can destroy you. Use the mirror universe to traverse blocked paths but there are blocked areas there too. Catch the humans unaware. You have 3 respawns per level. You hunger and humans are the only threat to your immortality.

Dank original chiptune trap soundtrack Inspired by: Junichi Masuda's Legendary Lavender Town theme, $uicideboy$, Cardi B, Haarper, Freddie Dread, and Bleed the wicked menace!

name: Shattered Plains
description:
After having taken the wrong pipe mario finds himself in a strange place yet again... the illusionary shattered plains. I suppose defeating bowser would be the obvious thing to do in this situation.

-5 worlds
-1 optional powerup per world
-3 endings
-sequence breaks?

name: Never Trust a Zone Warden
description: 5-10 minutes of vibes and violence, give or take.

name: Grimace Drop
description: Grimace Drop is an unofficial 60 level puzzle game based on the Grimace Shake meme. The aim of the game is to help Grimace safely reach the grass block by removing blocks until he reaches it.

name: URBO
description: URBO is a relaxing and meditative city-building puzzle game. Begin with an empty grid of landscape, choose an architectural style and build. Aim to support the needs of your people and your own aesthetic tastes, and watch your city flourish.

name: LEGO 2K Drive: Premium Drive Pass Season 2
description: Premium Drive Pass for Season 2 unlocks the ability to earn a total of 103 Premium Rewards at your own pace, including 11 Vehicles, 10 Drivers, 27 Brick Packs, and more!

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Definitive Edition
description: In this bundle, in addition to the main game, you will get access to a new Spring and Winter Islands.

name: Monotonia: First Contact
description: Monotonia: First Contact is a prologue-format experience, free and essential to pave the challenging and definitive cycle of MONOTONY. Work, pay your bills, and survive!

name: Chango
description: A Mystery. Someone is killing everyone. They talk about Chango. Will you be able to solve the mystery?

name: Mimic
description: You are a mother, your child needs you. Something evil is lurking outside. Be a good mother. Don't let it in.

name: OverDrift Festival: OverPass
description: This is a pass to progress and upgrowth your gaming career which opens up access to new features, opportunities and exclusive cars, and also accelerates the earning of in-game resources.

name: Best Adventure 4-in-1 Bundle
description: Endling – Extinction is Forever: As the last mother fox on Earth, your cubs need all your care to survive in a merciless world on the brink of destruction. Explore what is left of nature and defend your family against all threats.

name: Award Winning Indie Gems 4-in-1
description: Endling – Extinction is Forever: As the last mother fox on Earth, your cubs need all your care to survive in a merciless world on the brink of destruction. Explore what is left of nature and defend your family against all threats.

name: Neurotypical
description: You wake up as a teenager named Neo in a strange place, apparently in someones mind, and they want your help?! Collect items, fight enemies, and try not to get yourself annihilated! But always remember, nothing in this game is as "typical" as it seems.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Enchanted Adventure
description: This update for Dreamlight Valley adds a Beauty and the Beast Realm to the game, two new characters (Belle and the Beast), new quests for The Forgotten, the Haunted Holiday Star Path and the return of Halloween Dreamlight Duties.

name: BazookaCat
description: simple 2d shooter game for playdate

name: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour Japan
description: The mysterious and unique country of the "rising sun"! Collect fascinating puzzles, admire the beauty of Mount Fuji, look at sophisticated kimonos and explore the ancient shrines of Japan.

name: Twin P
description:
Twin P is a fast-paced one-button game.

You control a line with a pin on each end. One end is always pinned in place while the other constantly rotates clockwise. Press a button to pin the other end while releasing the first one or hold a button to extend the line. Your goal is to move around while avoiding the borders of the screen. Collect the coins to score points but avoid hitting the purple spikes.

The game is over when both ends of the line go beyond the borders of the screen or when you touch a spike.

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Villa Vista Set - Chapter 5
description: Decorate your very own Roman holiday!

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Taste of Rome Set - Chapter 5
description: Build your pizza empire with these decorations!

name: CryptoClash
description: Welcome to CryptoClash, the ultimate free-to-play multiplayer shooter that thrusts you into a cyberpunk world like no other. Are you ready to dominate the neon-soaked chaos and emerge as a legendary champion?

name: Slime Experiments
description: A 2D top down puzzle game where you play as a slime that must go through various experiments after finding yourself captured by some sort of slime researcher.

name: Axis Football 2024
description: Axis Football is a simulation-style football game featuring the industry's best franchise mode, massive customization, and realistic gameplay.

name: The Sheriff's Town
description: The Sheriff's Town is a game where you control a sheriff to exterminate hordes of zombies.

name: Greedy Chicken
description: Greedy Chicken is a 3D arcarde "endless-runner" type of game where you need to lead small chicken through the numerous obstacles, highway passes and collect as many coins as you can.

name: Breaking Box: Walk
description: A physics puzzle game that can only walk!

name: Cozy Trip
description: Embark on a Cozy Trip like no other! Immerse yourself in the joy of exploration, tranquility, and discovery. Unwind and relax as you navigate the town and its enchanting forest, uncovering hidden treasures along the way. Experience the magic today!

name: Nemo is going to School
description: Our main character, Nemo, goes to school. He goes up and up, which is 351m above the sky. There's nothing else to do if you fall. Just to not be late, he have to go up without a break! There are dangerous things above. You have to hold back even if you're angry. Now, head to school!

name: Mission: Space
description: After the Earth exploded, the fate of the Earth is in your hands. By creatively building your own spaceship, you'll fight your way through space against pirates. On your journey you will meet many different life forms, some with good, others with bad intentions.

name: Let's Play! Oink Games: Kobayakawa
description: Simple...or is it? An easy to learn card game full of bluffing and bravery. The "Kobayakawa" card is the key to victory!

name: Mystic Gate
description: Take the role of a wanderer and his robotic companion as they travel beyond the gate and attempt to master its secrets! Dash, dodge and take aim at hordes of enemies through procedurally generated dungeons that make every run feel unique. Presented in top-down pixel art style, Mystic Gate is a twin stick shooter that combines RPG elements with bullet hell action! Can you survive, upgrade and overcome the terrors of the gate to realize your ultimate dream?

name: Pro Strategy Football 2024
description: PSF 2024 - even more customizations! Sports Ticker! Waiver Draft! More stats! Improved AI! Improved Editor! Career can have 1 to 16 conferences and up to 140 teams! Fatigue and Injury sliders! More rules and overtime options!

name: Rebel
description: To find his past, to choose his future.

name: Hard Hero
description: Heroes are doing many things to save the world. Fight with enemy, dirve vehicles and combine to robot. Player control the vehicles and combine each other during avoid enemy's attack. Player can feel how hard to saving world. Challenge to being hero.

name: Glitchers: Hack 'em Up
description: Fight and Hack enemies in this casual beat ‘em up fantasy game with a puzzle twist.

name: Deep Nest
description: Deep Nest is a fast-paced single player action shooter roguelite where you play a space marine fighting off an endless horde of alien monsters in an infested facility.

name: Jake's Apple Harvest
description: A Sokoban game where you have to help Jake pick his apples.

name: Neurocracy 2.049
description: Solve a murder by diving in the Wikipedia of the future

name: Escape from Norwood
description: Explore a city that lives without your input in this illustrated text adventure. Observe the lives of its inhabitants behind the veil of your invisibility magic. Find items and combine them to solve intricate puzzles. Set your own pace as you control time and move freely in an open fantasy world.

name: Pokémon Scarlet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero - Part 1: The Teal Mask
description: Part 1 of the story expansion for Pokémon Scarlet

name: Pokémon Violet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero - Part 1: The Teal Mask
description: Part 1 of the story expansion for Pokémon Violet.

name: Treachery in Beatdown City: Ultra Remix
description: The massive update to Treachery in Beatdown City!

name: Heretic's Fork
description: Roguelike Deckbuilder where you use your cards to construct a hellish tower capable of keeping the endless hordes of the underworld from escaping their torment.

name: Plasma
description: Plasma is a creative engineering playground where you can build any device you can imagine. Bring to life your own amazing robots, factories, arcade machines, giant rampaging spiders, whole game worlds, and things that don't even have a name yet, then share them with the community.

name: I Am Die
description: I Am Die is a physics-based 3D puzzle platformer in which you play as the dice itself, guiding a ball through ramps, tubes, conveyors, and other obstacles. Explore, solve problems, and try not to roll a six!

name: Humanities Legend: Dark Horizon
description: A segmented open world action-adventure game. Fight bosses, explore dungeons, and find magic abilities to push out the Dark form the land. Collect and level up to fight stronger enemies.

name: Super Bomberman R 2
description: A sequel to Super Bomberman R, featuring an expanded story mode, and a new "Castle" battle mode which has one group teaming up to build castle defenses while the other attempts to breach the castle and take the treasure.

name: Gunbrella
description: Gunbrella is a noir-punk action-adventure set in a world dependent on a rapidly diminishing natural resource. Players take the role of a gruff woodsman on a quest for revenge, armed with the mysterious Gunbrella: a firearm that doubles as an umbrella. His investigation becomes entangled with the inner workings of ghouls and gangsters, cops and cultists, and the fallout of corporate exploitation.

name: Land Above Sea Below
description: Land Above Sea Below is an atmospheric building strategy and puzzle game where you have to build your island from tiles in order to raise its height as much as possible, to avoid it getting flooded by the constantly rising sea level.

name: Galaxy Pass Station
description: The year 3020. Be the first to meet all aliens from all over the galaxy. Check alien species and their galactic papers, manage your space station, and, please, try not to unleash a galactic war... near Earth. — Your favorite Spherical Corp.

name: Gravity Oddity
description: Defy gravity and warp your way through a procedurally generated galaxy in this roguelike space adventure. Put on your gravity boots and ready your teleport gun to find the best approach to defeat your enemies and loot their spaceships.

name: G-Switch 4: Creator
description: Sin descripción

name: Enceladus
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Team Rumble: Season 2
description: Party Mode was the second season of Crash Team Rumble, it began on the 12th of September 2023 and ended on the 5th of December 2023.

name: Subsurface
description: A small metroidvania in which you delve deeper into a planet, until you reach it's bottom...

name: Reload Map Jam
description: Map jam run by Slipgate Sightseer in cooperation with Reload Magazine, with the goal of picking 3 entries to write about in an article!​

name: Comic Coloring Book: Complete Edition - Paint Special
description:
Many adventures await!
Once upon a time, two children, a boy, and a girl found two unique toys - a robot and an alpacorn. These magically came to life to become our heroes' best friends! Together they experience amazing stories about friendship, helping others, and the joy of life!

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

name: Fun Chess: Premium Edition
description:
Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

This bundle includes the Ghost and Elf DLCs.

name: Pokedoku
description: Pokedoku is a daily guessing game where players must input a set of 9 unique Pokémon which agree with a given set of characteristics for each row and column in a 3x3 grid.

name: Golf With Your Friends: Fairytale Fables Pack
description:
Create your own legend with the Fairytale Fables Pack.
Get ready to find your new fae-vorite look with the Fairytale Fables Pack. This pack features an enchanting ensemble of new cosmetic options to customize your ball.

name: Super Monza GP 2
description:
This is a racing game for the 32K expanded Commodore VIC 20.

This game expands on the the original game by adding three more circuits (Monaco, Spa and Interlagos).

Colliding with cars now results in damage, which can be repaired by entering the pits during the race. More damage equals slower maximum speed.

"Race against the clock" mode has been replaced by a "Championship" mode, where you have to complete every race with a podium finish in order to continue.

name: My Life with a Lonely Beauty
description: Experience a heartwarming journey in Japan as you, a rebellious high school student, flee your suffocating life and find refuge in the arms of Haruka Ichinose, a beautiful and troubled woman reeling from life's disappointments. Amidst fun-filled escapades and awkward moments, you'll witness yourself forming an unconventional family with Komari Yuuki, a diligent childhood friend torn between duty and empathy, and Akira Himuro, a cynical and rebellious classmate harboring secret feelings. As the four of you navigate your interconnected lives, will your presence mend their fractured souls or lead to unforeseen complications?

name: City Police Simulator: Cop Car Games & Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Word Web by Powgi
description: A new Powgi word game for fans of logic puzzles!

name: Resonant Tale
description: Discover a handcrafted pocket size world full of secrets!

name: The Chant: The Gloom Below
description: Survive a mind-bending new chapter in The Chant: The Gloom Below DLC. Harness dark forms of Prismic Science with new ability upgrades and weapons against unpredictable enemy encounters. As each death leads you closer to escape, finding the right build is essential.

name: Combat Mission Fortress Italy: Gustav Line
description: CMFI Gustav Line Module depicts the desperate battle for the Italian mainland, revolving around Salerno, Anzio, and Monte Cassino, and culminating in the capture of Rome on June 4, 1944.

name: Combat Mission Fortress Italy: Rome to Victory
description: CMFI Rome to Victory Module Rome has been liberated! It's time to finish this war! Continue the march to the Alps as we introduce new TO&E that includes Indian, Brazilian, South African and Free French forces.

name: Midnight
description: Midnight features 7 maps of Doom action with a dark backdrop. Each map is relatively short and aims to present fun and challenging encounters with small numbers of monsters (every map has less than 120 enemies).

name: Lost Alone Ultimate: George's Nightmare
description:
Find 10 candles and place them on the ritual table before the demons find you.
Your heart won't be able to withstand this psychological experiment.

name: King of Fighters XV: Characters - Duo Lon
description: This character is also bundled together in the available KOF XV Fighter Pass DLC character set. Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.

name: Royal Romances: Endless Winter
description: Sometimes saving one life can change the fate of many. Can you melt the ice in people's hearts?

name: Only Way Up! Parkour Jump Simulator
description: Defy Gravity in Only Way Up! - The Ultimate Parkour Experience!

name: Golf With Your Friends: Peaceful Pines Course
description: Become one with nature with the new Peaceful Pines Pack.

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 6
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki accepting an invitation from her friend Sienna to go out drinking in a club, only to end up fucked in the restroom by the blonde's cocky boyfriend.

name: 3am in Leicester
description: Walk the streets of Leicester City and collect food. Become sober. Stay alert. There are ghosts. Made with the Godot Engine.

name: Schwarzerblitz: 8-Colors Star Guardians Collaboration Costumes - Chapter 1
description: Go, go, go, Star Guardians! This official collaboration between Schwarzerblitz and 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus brings a superheroic spin to your matches! Get 6 new cosplay costumes inspired by 8CSG and start fighting for Earth now! The DLC includes a stage and a new song for the jukebox/Free Match.

name: IdleDev
description: Dive into software development, face an irksome boss, rake in cash, chug energy drinks, and remember—no rage quitting allowed! Welcome to the untamed world of corporate code crafting.

name: Beat Survival
description: Beat Survival is 2D pixel action-adventure survival game where you can play as single or in 2 players local co-op where you start driving around, looting, scavenging, crafting, fishing, dismantling and do more missions. Not only you fight the bad guy and zombies, but you also interact with others.

name: Twisty Puzzle World
description: Twisty Puzzle World: 400+ twisty / magic puzzles, and an editor to make your own puzzles.

name: Hapy-y
description: The world's first "attuned" superhuman gets stuck in a quest room about his own life. The puzzles seem easy, but at one point his way out turns into a nightmare...

name: Cipher-8
description: Cipher-8 is a brain-twisting minimalist arcade puzzler where you push numbers into a grid and manipulate them with randomly drawn special abilities. Blitz mode is all about frantic combo streaks. In puzzle mode you can analyze every move. Both modes scale infinitely in their difficulty.

name: Bright Day
description: You awaken to a bright and sunny day. Wanting to go out and enjoy the beauty of the sun, you find that mysteriously, you can't leave. The doors are locked. No one is home. Strange noises can be heard behind your shoulder. Can you survive the nightmare slowly forming around you?

name: Truck Simulator & World of Machines: Game Bundle Collection
description: World of Machines - Tanks War operation. Features: 1. Diverse Locations 2. Challenging Missions 3. Extensive Tank Selection 4. Wide Rage of Camouflages 5. Team-Based Battles 6. Tactical Map and Reconnaissance 7.

name: Pumping Simulator 2
description: A gas station management game, start by selling a car to raise funds and invest in an abandoned plot of land. Build, expand, and upgrade your gas station, diversify services, customize and manage time efficiently during peak hours. And maybe you will become rich

name: Cosmic Cleaner
description: A stylish sci-fi arcade shooter about cleansing the galaxy of pesky demons! Cosmic Cleaner is a fast-paced, high score chasing action game that progressively gets more challenging. Designed for quick and easy fun.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: China
description: Have you ever dreamed of driving classic Chinese cars? The ones that are filled with passion and fascination? Or perhaps it's a newfound desire for you? Whatever the reason, now is the perfect time to start your Chinese adventure!

name: Cerulean Days
description: On a seemingly idyllic island, the Internet is shut down. What will become of those unable to adapt? In 2018, a lethal biological attack claims a significant number of lives. While tragedy occupies people's minds to the brim, a controlling governmental plan is put into effect.

name: 8-Colors Star Guardians +
description: Alien monsters have invaded Earth! It's up to the Star Guardians, a dysfunctional group of heroines, to protect the planet and awkwardly save the day (yet again)! Fight evil with pixelated style, in this turn-based, choose-your-boss-path game made with just 8 colors!

name: God of Weapons
description: Embark on a thrilling journey in God of Weapons, an action roguelike where you must ascend the tower of Zhor to reclaim the last light for the world. To survive the monster onslaught on each tower's level, you'll need to obtain and carefully organize weapons and accessories in your inventory.

name: Bikeout
description: Take a bike and go on extreme tracks Bikeout! Here you have to grow from a noob to a freeride legend.

name: Colourblind
description: Manipulate Colour and Machines to solve mind-bending puzzles and explore a Colourless sci-fi world

name: Snwbrd: Freestyle Snowboarding
description: Snwbrd - Is a Snowboard Game like AMPED and inspired by the AMPED Original Xbox Game, an action-packed, open-world snowboarding game that lets players experience the thrill and freedom of shredding the slopes.

name: Life's Too Short: A Christmas Spirit
description:
In Life's Too Short: A Christmas Spirit, you once again take on the role of a celestial problem-solver called back to the vampire's mansion. This time it's the count and countess themselves making the call...A rash decision has been made and it's your job to save Christmas!

You'll need to explore the mansion, meet various spooky characters and solve simple puzzles in order to ensure baby Vlad's first Christmas isn't ruined.

name: The Isle Tide Hotel
description: A live-action mystery FMV game, where you make decisions for a father that must rescue his teenage daughter from an eclectic cult before their final night at the Isle Tide Hotel. Save Eleanor Malone by making decisions, collecting clues, solving puzzles and unlocking hidden scenes and endings.

name: Somnipathy
description: What would you endure for a good night’s sleep? Find out in this point-and-click adventure thriller by guiding Aggy through a world where not all nightmares are dreams. Fight surreal monsters and help strange people... but can you preserve your sanity? The answers lie in Somnipathy...

name: One More Gate : A Wakfu Legend
description: One More Gate is a rogue-lite deck-builder that combines exploration and turn-based strategic combat. Head out to discover fantastic places, master the power of Wakfu to create destructive card combos, and defeat all those who would stand in your way!

name: Eternights
description: Eternights is a dating action game where you try to make the most out of life during the apocalypse. Monday: Go on a date. Tuesday: Clear dungeon. Friday: Freak out! The clock is ticking!!

name: MythForce
description: Inspired by beloved 80s cartoons, MythForce unites swords & sorcery with gripping 1st-person combat in a roguelite adventure fit for Saturday mornings. Brave the dungeon alone or join forces with friends to take on an ever-changing Castle of Evil!

name: Blockville
description: Blockville is a peaceful stylized city building simulation game where you can relax and build a city inspired by the toys you all used to play with when you were young. Now you have an excuse to play again as an adult in this stylized city sim.

name: Dirty Wars: September 11
description: Dive into the clandestine life of resistance against Pinochet's military regime where people are captured, tortured and murdered on a daily basis. Solve challenging puzzles and explore Santiago without getting caught in this sinister part its history.

name: Nour: Play with Your Food
description: Nour is an experimental food art game designed to make you hungry. Free from the constraints of scores, time limits, and realism, Nour lets you play with your food as if you're a kid again, with no mess to clean up.

name: BeatBeat
description: BeatBeat is the first of its kind: A rhythm platformer. Left hand moves, right hand grooves. Every level is packed with vaporwave aesthetics and funky beats. Beat Beat the game.

name: Brawl Stars: Back To Ranger Ranch
description: Sin descripción

name: Haiiro no Umi nite Kimi wo Matsu
description:
I walked along the beach in leather shoes, with my feet getting stuck in the sand.
The season is autumn. October. A comfortable temperature, neither hot nor cold.
I was with a third-year senior named Rin Sakuma, walking by the sea, where I couldn't swim because it was out of season.
Perhaps because the weather wasn't so good, the sea was dark and murky, reflecting the gray sky and forming waves.

A sad short BL visual novel about a senior and his junior.

name: Fighter Aircraft Race
description:
Epic Skyward Duels Await!

Dive into "Fighter Aircraft Race" – where high-speed aerial races meet thrilling local 2-player battles! Navigate treacherous skies, outmaneuver your rival, and flaunt your superior piloting prowess.

name: Feed It Souls
description: A metroidvania for the GBC

name: Easy Red 2: Normandy
description: With Easy Red 2: Normandy you will experience the historic battles of the D-Day landings and beyond in immersive detail.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Modern Lines Paint Jobs Pack
description: Each one of the designs included in this DLC has been handcrafted and selected by our talented artist & vehicle teams for their stylish and contemporary design. This new pack includes six new matching paint jobs for your truck and trailer(s), all of which are fully paintable and customizable!

name: OMSI 2: Agora Bus Family Citybus Vol. 1
description: Plunge into the middle of the urban hustle and bustle with the Renault Agora DLC for OMSI 2. Explore the narrow streets, master the challenges of traffic and feel the adrenaline of rush hour - all with the comfort of your passengers in mind.

name: Sailing Era: Edge of the World
description: In Sailing Era's DLC, World's End, you will be setting sail on a new adventure from Northern Europe! Raise your sails, fill your cargo hold, and crush the Hanseatic League's monopoly to expand your own trade route!

name: Sect-Machina
description: Sect-Machina is a fluid, atmospheric bug-themed metroidvania rendered in a vibrant 2D pixelated style, crafted with meticulous attention to detail in its combat, characters, environments, sound, and story.

name: Interballistic Symphony
description: A musical, fast-paced indie game all about speed and swift thinking. Navigate through tricky environments, use powerups to your advantage, push your skills to the limit and become the next interballistic master.

name: Dream #46
description: Chill exploration, contemplative ride game with a boat.

name: A-Mazing 3D
description: This game teaches patience, balance and precise movement. Your objective is to try to tilt the playing field up, down, left and right to guide the marble to the end of the maze without letting it fall into any of the holes. The closer you get to the finish, the higher your score becomes.

name: The Mythical City
description: Protect the magic crystal, to which waves of enemies are coming!

name: Bananarang: The Scattered Shards
description: The coolest, weirdest, wackiest and most fun 2D platforming game you'll ever play!

name: Humankind: Cultures of Oceania Pack
description: The Humankind Cultures of Oceania DLC includes:- 6 New Cultures - 6 New Wonders - 7 Independent Peoples - 15 Narrative Events - New in-game themed music tracks composed by Arnaud Roy

name: Dark Year
description: Dark Year medieval fantasy game with a dark air, embark on this adventure as Marius, a commander of the army of the northern kingdom, who must return to the castle his journey will be full of enemies and an evil that never sleeps awaits him... You will be able to face them.

name: Kappa Kanji Adventure
description: "Kappa Kanji Adventure" is an innovative and educational platformer game that combines the excitement of fast-paced jumping challenges with the intricate art of learning Kanji characters. Player embark on a thrilling adventure where their linguistic and platforming skills are put to the test.

name: Tales From The Arcade: Starship Murder
description: The astro hauler the SS Persephone is falling apart. You - the on-board AI - are being reactivated to perform the necessary repairs. The crew claims that the captain died in a mysterious accident, the same one that conveniently erased your memory banks... Are they telling the truth?

name: A Collection of Mini-Games
description: This is just a handful of mini-games that I created as I learn how to use and just play around with my RPGMaker. I created these just for fun, but was happy enough with the results that I wanted to let them be played by people to get their opinions, or any advice they may have.

name: Squirrel Stapler
description:
Originally created as part of The Dread X Collection II, Squirrel Stapler is a horror hunting simulator that satirizes low budget edutainment games with pitch black humor and panic-inducing absurdist horror.

A lonely man living in a remote cabin wakes up one day and realizes his beloved--a dismembered corpse nailed to the cabin wall--has been made ugly and rotten by the flies that swarm her. He wishes she were beautiful, like the squirrels of the wood. And so he sets out to hunt the squirrels of the wood, so that he might staple them to her and make her beautiful again.

But that is easier said than done. A sinister presence lurks in the deep forest, and it has only one rule: "Thou shalt not staple squirrels!"

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Tools
description: Puzzles of tools!

name: The Great Fear
description: Deep Fear will make you plunge into an atmosphere of horror and hopelessness. For salvation, you can only rely on yourself.

name: Square Word: Back to Work
description: Square Word is coming on Steam! Discover 100+ words spread in 4 chill themes! Handcrafted grids, hints, mini-objectives & more!

name: Solitaire Quest: Garden Story
description: Join the captivating journey of Solitaire Quest: Garden Story and watch the garden bloom under your care. Solve solitaire puzzles, restore the garden's beauty, and uncover the secrets that await. Play now and immerse yourself in the world of solitaire delight!

name: Boba Boyz
description: This all-new video game musical centers around a bubble tea shop with a secret: their boba actually brings happiness to its customers! When the boys need a new employee after their last crew member mysteriously disappears, boba won't be the only thing you fall in love with.

name: Homebound Haerold
description: On one really bad day of his own vicious cycle. On his way home, Little Haerold's car breaks down in the bad part of town. And then he breaks down, in the violent way. Now Haerold is Homebound and Postal.

name: Seoirye
description: "Seoirye" is a 2D platformer game that tells the story of Grandma Seo Irye, who embarks on a journey to the underworld to find her missing grandson. Help Grandma successfully locate her grandson and return safely!

name: The Dungeon Tower
description: Can you beat The Dungeon Tower? A Fun roguelike where you can select one of the heroes to battle against the tower. Increase your level, gain new skills and complete quests to personalize your hero to kill the lord! Try and die in this journey until you can get stronger power ups to beat the game!

name: On Air Island
description:
'On Air Island' is set on a mysterious 'remote island' that is full of intrigue.
It tells the mysterious and horrifying story of the main characters trapped on a remote island.

You are the audience, but you are also the ones who can save or kill the characters as they run for their lives from the dangers that abound on the deserted island.
Will the cast be able to escape the island's labyrinth that is closing in on them and survive?

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Gold Edition
description:
Gold Edition includes the game, the Year 1 Pass, and up to three days of early access to the game!

Pre-purchase to get the Liberty Walk Pack, including the Toyota GR Supra 2021 LBWK Edition.

Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate driving experience! Explore the vibrant open world of the island of O'ahu in Hawaii as you compete in intense races, themed events, and much more!

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Ultimate Edition
description:
Ultimate Edition includes the game, Year 1 Pass, Fitted Ultimate Pack, and up to three days of early access to the game!

Pre-purchase to get the Liberty Walk Pack, including the Toyota GR Supra 2021 LBWK Edition.

Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate driving experience! Explore the vibrant open world of O'ahu in Hawaii as you compete in intense races, themed events, and much more!

name: Silent Scream
description: Play as a fast-food restaurant worker in a Lovecraftian-themed world and face a Junji Ito-inspired monster. Buy mysterious items from The Gatekeeper. Sacrifice your customers to an otherworldly entity.

name: Trigger Henry
description: No checkpoints, 3 nerve-tingling stages, and insane jumps. Henry will torment you. Climbing up to him, you will go through hell. He will make you break mentally.

name: Heavy Burden
description: Explore the world in an abstract first-person platformer, immerse yourself in the game's philosophical meanings to awaken your desire to think.

name: Tavernacle!
description: Grab your hammers and start to craft in this co-op Tavern Defense for one to four players. As a team of Dwarves, you must gather supplies and build towers to protect your beloved brewery. Explore the world and learn to cooperate to achieve victory in this chaotic multiplayer game!

name: Hauma: A Detective Noir Story
description: Hauma is an episodic noir interactive graphic novel centered around the exploits of former detective Judith, her fixation on an old murder investigation, and how this unravels conspiracies within the upper echelons of society.

name: Rocket Shipment
description: Become master of grappling and fight against physics while flying a spaceship in this physics based space delivery game. Explore and complete main levels, or build your own with the level designer.

name: Golden Sun The Lost Age: Anniversary Mod
description: Golden Sun: The Lost Age with some added quality of life features for a more fun replay. Battles remain the same as the original game, but updates have made in the overworld to ease backtracking, puzzle solving, and inventory management

name: Simply Sudoku
description: A simple sudoku game for the Playdate handheld console.

name: Ruined District
description: Ruined District is a short city map for RAMP 2023 back in June, now revised and playing/looking a bit better than its first version. Adding traps to some areas and making the map just a tad harder overall.

name: Don't Punch Me
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping world of "Don't Punch Me," the ultimate test of reflexes and restraint! This captivating mobile and computer game challenges your control. Showcase your lightning-fast reflexes as you evade attacks, employ counter-attack moves, and showcase nimble footwork.

name: Secrets of the Haunted Mansion
description: "Secrets of the Haunted Mansion" is an immersive interactive adventure game that transports players into the dark and mysterious world of an abandoned and haunted estate. Step into the shoes of an explorer, ready to unearth forgotten secrets and unravel intriguing puzzles.

name: The Garden of Silvergrass
description: The main character, Naho, meets a mysterious fox spirit named Semi in a silver grass field. Fall into her lovely charm. The closer you get to her, the more you will face her and your dark past. Can your choice create a new future?

name: Rage of Towers
description: Rage of Towers is a modern Realistic Tower defense game. Typically, you build towers on the path to destroy enemies before they reach the end, But what if you could take control of the tower by yourself and feel the battlefield.

name: Deserted "Firefly Islands": Chronicles
description: A survival game with crafting and building elements.

name: Elasto Mania Trilogy Pack
description:
All your favorite ELMA titles in one iconic collection.
A great deal and an epic experience in one neat bundle.

name: Space Station Cargo Simulator
description: SSCS is an indie arcade game with puzzle elements, where you take the role of a simple cargo sorter in a huge corporation. You will have to sort the cargo by weight, fragility and content.

name: Raincouver
description: Welcome to Raincouver, a sprawling cyberpunk metropolis on the brink of oblivion. With the city falling into chaos, the government races to eliminate the threat, setting the stage for a desperate mission to rescue your loved one before Raincouver is reduced to ashes at ground zero.

name: Outlaw's Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: Amatsu Sora ni Saku
description: Sin descripción

name: Reheat: The Rescue
description:
Go on a journey with your little brother to rescue your father from the Ice Golem Mage!

Master Heat Flow in this chess-like game. Move your units and use abilities like Conduction and Radiation.

Reheat - The Rescue is a short educational game that teaches about heat flow. Made originally for the Legends of Learning educational games platform.

name: Smile-X 4
description: Embark on a heart-pounding journey in "Smile-x 4," the latest installment of the popular horror game franchise, Smiling-X. As the fearless leader of the resistance, Hari, and the resourceful Daneel, you will face the ultimate challenge of putting an end to the evil reign of the X Corporation.

name: Hanasou
description:
September 20th. Ohigan.
The main character, Kikuri, has come to visit a grave with his childhood friend, Ayame.
Kikuri had a twin brother named Kikuno.
The twin's older brother, Kikuno, died in a traffic accident during summer vacation.

A melancholic love-hate BL game where you go to visit your twin brother's grave with your childhood friend.

name: Omh
description: Short for Original Mario Hack, ~omh~ is the successor to the 2021 game, R-ACK. It is the 'is the missing letters of R-ACK'. It follows "The Plumber" as he explores OMHland.

name: Super 8 Football
description: Super 8 Football is an American football game using real NFL teams and players. There are 8 playoff teams from last season made up of 16 players with 8 on both offense and defense. The game requires two players.

name: Soft Kitten Experience
description: Created by Sylvie & Aria, featuring music by Frédéric Chopin and 煉獄庭園 (Rengoku Teien) The difficulty is extremely high. Controls: Figure it out yourself!

name: Casual Crusade
description: Sin descripción

name: Only Fortress
description: Become the hero of your own fortress! Defend, customize, and explore in this PvP & PvM strategy game. Unleash your skills, lead your troops, and dominate in the battles. Build, fight, and conquer on the open world cross-platform online game!

name: Micro Games for Playdade!
description: Made in one day, Spin to Win!

name: Prawngeon
description: Sonic and Ö ran away from home and curiously Zodos knew where they were going. In Shrimpland is Prawngeon, a dungeon infested with shrimp and prawns, explore this mysterious place with Zodos and find his friends before it's too late (there really is no time). If you play carefully you can save a third friend!

name: Mudness Offroad 2
description: Unleash Your Off-Road Passion and Leave Rivals in Your Dust!

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Pack - The Blitz
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Maggot Feast
description: Short 5 minute exploration game about collecting tools for your loved one.

name: Thunder War Rabbit Alien Fight
description: A Cosmic Battle Begins: Thunder War Rabbit to the Rescue!

name: Bunny's Pizza Tycoon
description: Open and customize an old restaurant! Inspired by the fnaf series, you play the role of a company owner during the day and a worker during the night. Buy Items during the day and maybe make a little bonus cash during the nights so you can make money the next day!

name: Observer
description: Observer is a 3D hand-drawn cartoon roguelite game. You will become the legendary heroes of the forest, choose a new destiny for them, and guard this mysterious forest for them.

name: Old School
description: Relive your school days in 3D, where old school graphics bring back timeless fun! Create your own star student and attend a schedule full of classes in time to gather the knowledge you need to thrive, while an equally important popularity contest challenges you survive...

name: As Long As It's Not Illegal: Last Act
description: Many revelations will be realized as Roxanne's year the the crew comes to an end in the finale of this episodic trilogy.

name: Farm Garden Simulator
description: Farm Garden Simulator is a farm simulator game where you can grow a lot of crops and raise animals.

name: Shut Up, Rabbit!
description: Shut Up, Rabbit! is a shooting survival game mainly for relaxing. A chatty rabbit with sci-fi laser gun and cannon to fight with animals to survive in the forest.

name: Only go up
description: Get up there to avoid the rising water! It's scary, but you have to step up. It's up to you to adapt to reality or struggle.

name: Doughbee
description: A real time wave based roguelike about battling doodle creatures and collecting perks along the way, with ranging effects from elemental damage to things like rammer Doughbee and even a scorpion mech, see how far you can make it through this bullet hell of a nightmare.

name: Bonfire And Tail
description: Bonfire and Tail is a multiplayer action party game developed by avidya studio. Through the gameplay, we want to bring players back to childhood and have simple fun together. Draw a torch from the bonfire and ignite other players' tails! If your tail is on fire, wiggle it to put the fire out!

name: Cook Fest
description: Create and design your own complex maze by strategizing your festival spaces! Cook and serve dishes to satisfy your customers. Level up to unlock to new ingredients and recipes. With unexpected roguelite elements and fast-paced gameplay, you can play solo or in chaotic co-op with your fellow chef!

name: Entangled Souls
description: Why did she choose death? In a nightmare of madness, she searches for abominable memories. This is a horror action adventure game that can be played with simple movement controls and a single button. There are no lines or sentences. You can play regardless of your location or language.

name: Incubus: A ghost-hunters tale
description: You are on your first solo ghost hunt, under the watchful instructions of Bear and Jen from the O.P.G paranormal team. Use real gadgets in a real location, a house investigated by the developers on the request of three different owners. It is a case worthy of a video game, so welcome to Incubus.

name: Microvolts: Recharged
description: Microvolts Recharged is a quirky lobby-based third-person shooter with a unique toy theme. The game features a fun character cast and freely swappable 7 weapon types. Battle it out across dozens of large well-designed maps and frag your enemies!

name: Runner Heroes: The Curse of Night and Day - Enhanced Edition
description: Runner Heroes is a unique adventure in which you control two characters at the same time. Sprint your way through the mystical lands of Celuria, a war-torn land of magic, to break a wicked curse and reunite with your childhood sweetheart. Do you accept the challenge? Follow Colwyn and Lyssa, heirs of their respective kingdoms, as an evil Red Witch prevents their love from flourishing. Harness the magic of Celuria to fight her curse as she chases you across 5 challenging worlds! Escape her clutches by running, jumping, diving and riding mine cars across 47 levels.

name: The Lust City
description: You’re a seasoned explorer on a mission with your expedition crew into the deep jungle. Find lost treasure, explore the ancient mysteries that surround the tribe and build your own harem in The Lust City!

name: My Talking Angela 2+
description: This is a port of My Talking Angela 2 exclusively for Apple Arcade that removes all the ads and microtransactions.

name: Infinity War
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Pixels: Medieval Pack
description:
This Medieval-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Experience Romanticised European History at its finest with this book!

From Knights and Armour to the peasants in the fields, this book covers it all.

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Deluxe Edition
description:
Embrace the wonders of the night sky alongside an adorable kitten named Fellie.
Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Cat’s Cosmic Atlas takes you through the Southern and Northern skies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn a thing or two about the vast Universe that surrounds us.

name: Urban Flow: Back to School Edition
description:
Become one with the flow. The Urban Flow!

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, London Rules and Streets Supplement.

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Northern Sky Map
description: Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn even more with Northern Sky Map. Travel through our Solar System or stroll along the Southern and Northern sky. Your journey into space starts now!

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Southern Sky Map
description: Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn even more with Sorthern Sky Map. Travel through our Solar System or stroll along the Southern and Northern sky. Your journey into space starts now!

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Solar System Map
description: Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn even more with Solar System Map. Travel through our Solar System or stroll along the Southern and Northern sky. Your journey into space starts now!

name: Crowd City
description:
Gather people accross the city and crush your opponents with your overwhelming leadership. The more people you run into, the bigger your crowd becomes!

Beware! If other group has more members, yours will be taken completely and you will have to start from scratch...

Try out a variety of funny skins and play on different maps.

name: TrollLab
description: Discarded and abandoned, you embody an outcast escaping fate. Discover a pathway to a hidden underground troll facility. A series of challenging trolls and discoveries await. A road to the truth calls from the void.

name: Loom
description:
Explore 12 environments that represent archived segments of a primordial backend to a simulated world.

Reccomended to be played in Windowed mode.

name: Heir of Light Eclipse
description:
Immerse yourself in an awe-inspiring realm where light and darkness wage a never-ending war...

Accompany the enchanting girl, Nua, guarded by Goddess Ludmilla, in this breathtaking anime-style fantasy adventure!

name: Out in Space Bundle: Tin Can & Orbit.Industries
description: Explore space in two simulators - Tin Can and orbit.industries.

name: Word Quest
description: Are you ready to wield words as weapons and conquer the quest?

name: Nathan Jones and The Eternal Myth
description: Follow Nathan Jones on his epic quest through magical worlds and emotional challenges to unlock the secrets of an ancient myth and save the World.

name: Candlebook Island
description: Make friends with your coworkers, discover their lives and history, treat sick monsters, and research mysterious illnesses!

name: Rise of a Hero
description: Clear the areas captured by terrorists in Syria from terrorists and rescue the hostages.

name: Foxes Need to Eat
description: Control an adorable fox in scenarios full of traps and obstacles.

name: NBA 2K24: 25th Anniversary Edition
description: Grab your squad and experience the past, present, and future of hoops culture in NBA 2K24. Enjoy loads of pure, authentic action and limitless personalized MyPlayer options in MyCareer. Collect an impressive array of legends and build your perfect lineup in MyTEAM. Feel more responsive gameplay and polished visuals while playing with your favorite NBA and WNBA teams.

name: Rally Racing: Cars & Drift Mania
description: Rev up your engines in Rally Racing.

name: Breath of the Depth
description: The crew of Project Flounder is lost in a mysterious shipwreck, and only L survives. When he escapes the submarine, he finds himself in a mysterious and lost country. It was full of never-seen sights, ancient ruins and unknown artifacts, and it made him want to explore every corner, every secret.

name: Blitz Runner
description: In Blitz Runner, you'll dash through colorful landscapes, collecting dazzling gems that not only increase your score but also your speed! The more gems you collect, the faster you run, making every game a unique and exhilarating journey.

name: C.I.E.B The Backrooms Project
description: Prepare. Explore. Survive. Extract. Profit. You will explore the infinite backrooms and bring back proof of your journey. In return I will allow you to browse a catalog so our scientist can increase your odds at survival. You will have to cover some expenses like body upkeep and so forth. Good Luck.

name: Grunenberg
description: "Grunenberg" is a single-player horror game that utilizes the visual and sound design of VHS tapes. The protagonist, Jimmy Solomon, comes to the abandoned area named Grunenberg to find his grandfather and captures everything he sees on the camera as his grandfather's request.

name: Little Dew Drop
description: Little Dew Drop is a small, relaxing and slow-paced 2D platformer. Enjoy the original soundtrack while travelling through six increasingly challenging levels.

name: Dark Theme Bundle
description: Face your fears with this spooky bundle!

name: Simulator Bundle: Gas Station Simulator and Barn Finders
description:
Looking for a simulator bundle that will grab you for hours?
Here it is!

name: Lost & Found Agency: Collector's Edition
description: Play this great new hidden objecft game from AVI Games. Get and fullfill orders from the detective agency “Lost & Found Agency” to search for missing objects. Go to fascinating locations and explore dangerous places, decipher clues and uncover secrets. Find the missing objects and solve crimes.

name: Guidelicious
description: A short, interactive visual novel about waking up in a strange room with a mysterious man. But why are you here? Let Him be your Guide to the truth.

name: Laruaville 3
description: Summer, Winter, Spring and Autumn aren't functioning properly, so you have to use your Match3 skills to get it fixed. Build a town to recreate rain,snow,clouds and more.

name: Sex Play: The Sauna
description: A quick and dirty game made especially for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. You play the role of a man who goes to the sauna and receives a special treatment.

name: Winter Valley Hike
description: Embark on a serene journey through the enchanting Winter Valley, a place of tranquility and discovery. Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature as you roam freely, seeking out hidden treasures and unique locations that will leave you breathless.

name: Little Wing
description: Embark on a dangerous journey through the wilderness, searching for the Little Wing, atop the Mountain - in this challenging and charming platformer. Brave levels with many dangers, with tight and precise jumping, stamina management and attacks. Can you find the Little Wing?

name: Find Up!
description: Find the differences between two images. Export images as wallpapers. Built-in game editor allows players to make their own game content. Support Steam workshop to share the ugc content.

name: Alien Investigator
description: Alien investigator is a 4 player online co-op horror game. Join a team of investigators and use all your alien expert equipment to gather as much evidence as you can. Learn extraterrestrial facts based on photos, videos and real life eyewitness accounts.

name: Slime Volley
description: Step into the bouncy and exciting arcade game of Slime Volley! This isn't your typical volleyball game – it's an arcade sensation that takes the classic sport and gives it a bouncy, slimy twist. Prepare for a thrilling multiplayer showdown as you leap onto the court for some fast-paced action.

name: Cold Verdict 2
description: A direct sequel to 'Cold Verdict'. Another group of people wake up in a strange abandoned location, trying to find a way out and understand why they were put there. What is the killer's endgame in all this? A short interactive story with choices.

name: Cube Jump
description: Minimalist cube jumper with plenty of achievements.

name: School: The Hardest RPG in Your Life
description: School: The Hardest RPG in Your Life is a small RPG game that is happening at a high school. You play as Eli who has learned that he needs to pass all of his classes otherwise he will have to go to Summer School for his entire summer break.

name: Whitestone
description: On the 'Sunchaser's capstone voyage to the Arctic, it's smooth sailing until Jack's quarters are broken into and his friend goes missing. Unsure who to trust, Jack is forced to fight nightmares both mental and physical as he becomes the prime suspect for a terrible deed.

name: I Made this Game in 3 Days
description: Embark on a buggy adventure in "I made this Game in 3 Days"! I'm not kidding when I say this roguelike masterpiece was birthed in just 72 hours. Dive headfirst into a realm of whimsical chaos, where every bug is a feature and every glitch is a delightful surprise.

name: Color Odyssey
description: Color Odyssey is a 3D platformer game, where you have to swap between 4 worlds to proceed, using your ingenuity and skill. You play as Gloria, a girl that lived in a blank, lifeless world, in her adventure to discover 4 colorful new ones!

name: Zombie Horde Dominator
description: You need to immediately use various crazy weapons with your companions to kill more and more zombies, establish defense, and eventually the zombies will surge in like a tide

name: Through Time the Girl Puzzle
description: "Gentleman puzzle, relying on puzzle skills and skills to keep moving into the hearts of various beautiful girls! "

name: Fae Farm: Deluxe Edition
description: Escape to the magical life of your dreams in Fae Farm. Purchase the Deluxe Edition of Fae Farm.

name: Poly Ego
description: Do you have what it takes to become the next test subject to pass my tests? I've crafted them with care! I'm looking for robots willing to be part of the...good robots! Use your logic to pass the laser experience tests and become a legitimate robot!

name: National Park Girls: Episode 5 - Eternal Evergreen Part 2
description: National Park Girls: Episode 5 - Eternal Evergreen Part 2 is the final installment in the episodic visual novel National Park Girls.

name: Creature Rumble
description: Creature Rumble is a turn based, single payer card game that allows you to collect 65+ unique creature cards. Create the best deck to defeat your foes and become the greatest rumble master of all time.

name: Twyla
description: You are a spaceship pilot involuntarily involved into some events whose income is unclear. You meet a beautiful stranger, an inhabitant of another civilization. You're taking her side and going to protect her in the circumstances.

name: Cush's Amazin' Adventure!!
description: A monster living in a small town set on a journey to become a hero. Explore stages of typical fantasy world. Help this monster kill the demon king and become a saviour of the world. But if you don't want to... You have another choice.

name: Vampire Mansion
description: Explore the mansion, find a way to fight the vampires, find the key, and escape the mansion.

name: The Book Of Hiro
description: “The Book of Hero” is a 3D visual puzzle game where players solve challenges and puzzles using illusions and perspective to find the hidden key in the map. The game tells the story of a brave villager named Hero who was ordered to meet the king and encountered various challenges and puzzles.

name: Non-Fellows
description: Follow adventures of four not as much friends as they finds their way through zombie city, get acquainted with an ancient vampire and discover what happened to their cute blonde friend after this meeting. Republish of an old point-and-click adventure, with all 3 episodes in a single game.

name: Space Maze
description: Help the crew of the Aurora and their captain, the fearless John Smith, to reach their destination and deliver the cure for humanity, thus saving the human race.

name: Anonymous;Code: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Digital Deluxe Edition Contents
- Game - Anonymous;Code
- Interactive Digital Art Book - A Beginner's Guide to Earth Simulator
- Full Digital Soundtrack with 52 songs - Sound Data Log

name: Jimbaori: The Onin War
description:
Set in feudal Japan during the late 16th century, the story follows the rise and fall of Hideyoshi, a man consumed by his hunger for power and the tragic consequences that ensue.

As Hideyoshi's life nears its end, his insatiable thirst for power and the consequences of his actions culminate in a dramatic clash between nations.

Driven to expand his influence and secure his legacy, Hideyoshi embarks on a campaign that will test his military prowess and, ultimately, seal his fate.

As the invasion unfolds, Hideyoshi faces unexpected resistance from the Korean forces led by the renowned Admiral Yi Sun-sin.

name: Broken Hearts Island
description: Broken Hearts Island, a visual novel in the fantasy genre, tells the story of the adventures of a young oceanologist on a mysterious island.

name: Cut Master Spades
description: Quick, seamless, and HIGHLY engaging Spades matches between real people. Play with your friends, enjoy the classic game in immersive 3D with quirky characters. Match up online and climb the leaderboards or just have a chill session with your buddies. There's a table for everyone!

name: SwarmsurgE
description: Survive the Swarm of monsters Surging across the land, leaving destruction and chaos in their wake. Warriors with unique abilities and strengths can attempt to venture out alone to confront the raging swarms. But they will have to band together in order to survive and defeat the monstrous horde.

name: RPG Alchemy
description: RPG Alchemy is a variation of the Alchemy genre in the RPG theme, so connecting two objects to uncover a third one until everything is discovered.

name: Planet of War: The Legend of Fu
description: Save the world the way you want to: Most main and side quests as well as the game itself have several endings depending on your choices. A tactical combat system with over 100 different character and equipment skills. Over 20 hours of gameplay and over 20 original soundtracks.

name: Pyroworks
description: Pyroworks is a free-to-play online multiplayer game containing fireworks from real-life companies from all over the globe. You can choose to make your own show, cause destruction and chaos or simulate new years. Don't miss out on playing with your friends - the most fun part.

name: NBA 2K24: Black Mamba Edition
description:
Grab your squad and experience the past, present, and future of hoops culture in NBA 2K24. Enjoy pure, authentic action and limitless personalized MyPLAYER options in MyCAREER. Collect an impressive array of legends and build your perfect lineup in MyTEAM. Relive your favorite eras as a GM or Commissioner in MyNBA. Experience next-level gameplay and lifelike visuals with your favorite NBA and WNBA teams in PLAY NOW.

Recreate some of Kobe’s most dominant and captivating performances during his rise to global superstardom. Revisit his early career triumphs as a young phenom, and progress through his transcendent journey from elite scorer to one of the greatest players of all time.

name: NBA 2K24
description: Grab your squad and experience the past, present, and future of hoops culture in NBA 2K24. Enjoy pure, authentic action and limitless personalized MyPLAYER options in MyCAREER. Collect an impressive array of legends and build your perfect lineup in MyTEAM. Relive your favorite eras as a GM or Commissioner in MyNBA. Experience next-level gameplay and lifelike visuals with your favorite NBA and WNBA teams in play now.

name: Beast Slayer
description: Embark on an adventure in an 8-bit open world where monsters roam free. Track down and defeat dangerous beasts. With different classes & genders, skills & spells, each time you play will be different. Feel the nostalgia as you listen to an 8-bit soundtrack while flying on the wings of a dragon.

name: RoundRunners Playground
description: Play tag-like gamemodes with a chance of random effects to happen. Roll, climb and bunnyhop to dodge fellow roundrunners as you’re trying not to get tagged. Face up against your friends or randoms in this easy-to-pick-up game. Make the map your playground.

name: Birds Aren’t Real
description: As a government surveillance pigeon drone, you'll engage in missions, sneak around the city, and use your creative thinking to manipulate the townsfolk and dispel their suspicions about your totally not-real Avian Task Force.

name: Solo Hunt: Ten Floor
description: Solo Hunt: Ten Floor is a rogue-like action rpg dungeon crawler with ten treacherous levels filled with fearsome monsters, deadly traps, and puzzles to be solved.

name: Fae Farm
description: Escape to the fairytale life of your dreams in Fae Farm, a cozy farm-sim RPG for 1-4 players. Craft, cultivate, and decorate to grow your shared homestead—and use spellbinding magic to explore the enchanted island of Azoria.

name: Hero's Party R
description: "Find 30 people to come to the Demon Castle party!" One day, the king received a letter from the demon king, the old enemy of mankind. Although it was obviously a trap, the king decided to take advantage of this opportunity to suppress the Demon Castle.

name: Sprout Valley
description: Sprout Valley is an upcoming farming simulator game where you can step back from the busy life and grow the garden of your dreams. Captivating story, hand-crafted experience, cute graphics and many more!

name: Increment
description: Press buttons, pull levers, and use your body to discover a strange world in this VR game about increasing. There’s nothing “idle” about this game. Immerse yourself in weird, colorful, reactive environments in this experimental, thought-provoking, hour-long incremental adventure.

name: Mage of the Olekta Desert
description: A stealth survival RPG. Accepting a request from the adventurers guild, Aisha must make her way through the dangerous Lekta Ruins in order to find the great mage, Lowen.

name: The Outbreak Story
description: Join Noah as he follows in his deceased father's footsteps: becoming an agent of the Special Paranormal Defense Forces, a secret organisation that protects people from the paranormal. The organisation has its hands full, however, as a strange disease turns people into monsters.

name: Synced
description: Synced is a companion shooter game set in a techno-apocalyptic future. You are a Runner who must fight against enemy teams and synchronize with Nano companion classes to deploy in combat. Strengthen your squad, upgrade your weapons, and discover the mysteries of the Meridian.

name: La Libertad Arrasa: Milei
description:
Casual runner video game where you control Milei.

You must move forward and reduce unnecessary government spending to finally take down the central bank and dollarize the country, leading to a stable economy.

Dodge obstacles, destroy ministries, and face the final BOSS.

name: ExolonFX
description: ExolonFX is an Arduboy conversion of the ZX Spectrum release of Exolon, a run and gun game programmed by Raffaele Cecco and published by Hewson Consultants in 1987.

name: Fire Emblem: On the Edge
description: Sin descripción

name: Paddle! Shimmyoumal!
description: This game is a secondary Touhou game in which Shimmyoumaru is the main character.

name: Pikmin 2: Caveless Edition
description: Pikmin 2: Caveless Edition is a brand-new mod of Pikmin 2, which redesigns the story mode of Pikmin 2 to remove all of the caves and keep the design and style similar to Pikmin 1 and 3. There are numerous changes to the gameplay and level design to suit this new playstyle, including White Pikmin having their own onions (credit to PikHacker for the Purple and White Onions mod), different enemies and bosses on the overworld and a completely redesigned progression. It’s up to you and your squad of Pikmin to collect all 51 treasures scattered across the four overworlds.

name: Color Sense Challenge
description:
A brain-training art certification game that hones your mind.
It's a brain-training game where you can test your color perception with simple controls.

name: Pipe Line Puzzle
description:
Connect the complex pipes by rotating them!
This simple yet deep puzzle game lets you twist the panels and create a flowing water path by connecting the pipes.

The controls are easy - just touch the panel you want to rotate.
Find the start and end points of the pipes and keep connecting them by rotating.

Earn 1 to 3 stars based on your completion time and aim for 3 stars on all stages!

name: Best Multiplayer and Co-op 6-in-1 Bundle
description: Aces of the Luftwaffe – Squadron: The Aces of the Luftwaffe have returned! Dodge a hail of bullets and face their fearsome war machines in bombastic air battles and boss fights!

name: eFootball 2024
description:
eFootball 2024 is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami as part of their ongoing eFootball series. Released in September 2023, it is an update to eFootball 2023 rather than a completely new title, continuing the free-to-play model introduced with the previous instalments.

The game features updated team rosters, enhanced graphics, and refined gameplay mechanics.

name: Vikings: Valhalla
description:
Earn your place among the gods in this strategy game based on the hit series. Build your settlement and lead raids against rivals to become a legend.
Ready to immerse yourself in the world of Vikings: Valhalla?
Prove your might in PvP battles, build and upgrade your settlement, recruit and lead your warband on raids against rivals for resources, riches and glory. Defend your settlement from enemy attacks and take part in campaign battles to progress through an original story inspired by the hit Netflix series!

name: Superior Relatives
description: Superior Relatives is a couch-based multiplayer fighting game. Choose from a variety of balls and battle it out with up to four players in online multiplayer. Enjoy a variety of maps and characters, as you battle it out to be the ultimate champion.

name: The Hunt
description: A supernatural killer stalks five camp counsellors through lethal nightmares in a psychological game that blurs the line between reality and the subconscious.

name: Forest Crash Party
description:
Two people rather than playing alone
more than playing together

name: Cube Merge 2048
description: Welcome to Cube Merge 2048: Your Mystical Forest Puzzle Sensation! Embark on a captivating journey through the heart of a mystical magical forest, where the power of merging and strategy collide in the ultimate puzzle adventure.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 4: Impossible Objects
description: Experience the exciting universe of The Expanse like never before in Telltale’s latest adventure, The Expanse: A Telltale Series. Follow Cara Gee, who reprises her role as Camina Drummer, and explore the dangerous and uncharted edges of the Belt aboard the the Artemis. From scavenging wrecked ships in a zero-g environment, to surviving a mutiny, to combating fearsome pirates, you make the difficult choices and reveal Camina Drummer’s resolve in this latest Telltale adventure.

name: Red Tie Runner
description: Red Tie Runner is a simple but challenging 2D platformer. Put on a red tie and step into stick-figure shoes to navigate through 30 levels so intense you might just forget about the impending heat death of the universe.

name: Hotel Renovator: Disco Room & Furniture Set
description: Get ready to boogie down and transform your hotel into dazzling disco paradises with the Disco Room & Furniture Set for Hotel Renovator! Step into the glitzy world of disco with this sizzling hot DLC that adds a burst of retro energy to your hotel renovations.

name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern SD70ACU
description: Now, you can climb aboard the powerful Norfolk Southern SD70ACU, as created by developer Travel by Train, to haul heavy tonnage in Train Simulator Classic!

name: Isonzo: First Wave
description: Enhance your Isonzo experience by requisitioning a variety of cosmetic Unit Pack DLCs with the Wave sets! First Wave includes all the core Isonzo Unit Pack DLCs: the Reserve Units, Veteran Units, Elite Units, and Alpine Units.

name: Arcade Archives: Zing Zing Zip
description:
"ZING ZING ZIP" is a shooter released by ALLUMER in 1992.
Operate the 1P aircraft with fast vertical movement speed or the 2P aircraft with fast horizontal movement speed to defeat the evil empire.
Aim to clear the screen by making full use of various items and rolling special moves that make you invincible or power up while activated

name: The Sims 4: Modern Luxe Kit
description: Treat yourself to luxurious modern furniture that says “I made it” with The Sims 4 Modern Luxe Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Poolside Splash Kit
description: Turn heads at the pool with bright and playful swimwear from The Sims 4 Poolside Splash Kit.

name: DJMax Respect V: MapleStory Pack
description: DJMax Respect V - MapleStory Pack Now enjoy the songs of MapleStory in DJMaxRespect V.

name: The Hero gives up!... Wait, What!?
description: Adult-Only Fantasy Visual Novel featuring 5 girls, plenty of choices, comedy, and sex in a laid-back story!

name: Crowned Control
description: A couch co-op multiplayer game, where the goal is to grab the crown and keep it on your head for as long as possible to win the game!

name: Farther Forest
description: Farther forest - is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. Kill different enemies with your weapons! Complete different tasks and deal with the monsters that stand in your way, and beware of deadly traps.

name: DropingBalls
description: This is a simple casual game for avoiding falling balls. You can move the protagonist through AWSD to exercise your reaction and planning abilities while resting. It comes with a maximum survival time recording mechanism.

name: A Lively Haunt
description: Are you bold enough to enter A Lively Haunt alone? Or must you join a friend to investigate this 2-player, old-school, text parser adventure game?

name: Elephant Rave 2
description: The rave goes on! 14 years after his first rave, the elephant has returned for monumental challenge: avoiding very, very deadly beams of light

name: X-Plane 12: FSDesigns - Pensacola International Airport
description: Pensacola International Airport is a public use airport 3 nautical miles northeast of the central business district of Pensacola in Escambia County, Florida, United States.

name: X-Plane 12: FSDesigns - Jacksonville International Airport
