description: Jacksonville International Airport is a civil and military airport that serves as the primary gateway to Northeast Florida, being one of the busiest in the state. The airport was built in the mid-1960s to replace Imeson Field as Jacksonville’s main airport.

name: X-Plane 12: FSDesigns - Alliance Municipal Airport
description: Welcome to Alliance! Alliance Municipal Airport, just about 3 miles southeast of the town of Alliance is statistically known as the least used airport in mainland USA. It offers scheduled passenger flights from, and to Denver with Denver Air Connection on the Fairchild Metroliner

name: Inertia Ball
description: This is an unusual adventure future simulation space game, in different gravity under your operation will also change. Players can feel the vastness of different planets in the game, feel different gravity, feel their own different operations. Conquer the universe!

name: Redeemer's Run
description: Fight. Conquer. Reunite.

name: River Pirates
description:
Easy to play Tower Defense game with a pirates setting.

River Pirates has an invading horde of pirates sailing up river to attack your stronghold. You defend your keep by placing a variety of defenses along the river's banks to prevent the pirates from navigating the river from one side of the screen to the other.

name: Sweet Neighbors
description: "Sweet Neighbors" is a visual novel for adults only. The main character Ethan moves to a new neighborhood and becomes involved in a love triangle with young Ava and her mother Olivia. He faces a difficult choice - who to stay with and who to lose.

name: Springtime Hike
description: Experience the beauty of spring and the wonders of the forest in Springtime Hike. Explore hidden locations, uncover the secrets of nature, and complete the ultimate hike. Your journey begins now.

name: Cellosseum
description: Cellosseum is a bullet heaven following the progress of a lone cell as it battles a variety of enemies on its quest to guide the evolutionary process of life itself. Upgrade your attacks, shields, health, and speed to understand your role in the creation of life on the planet of Ceres Prime.

name: Apothecary
description: A cute story-driven zen puzzler in which you brew potions, customize your workshop, and interact with the quirky residents of the magical town of Mangrove.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Alfheim
description: Perfect your mini golf for an eternity amidst a gleaming, spiritual realm untouched by time: Alfheim - Land of Elves. A hidden realm of light and beauty from Norse mythology, this serene and timeless course grants you calm and supernatural beauty in a spellbinding and relaxing forest hideaway.

name: Good Fruit
description: This is a simple casual game. The main content is to cut off various fruits that constantly pop up on the screen, which requires players to move quickly and accurately. Once the bomb is cut, the game ends.

name: Codebreaker: Defuse or Boom
description: Crack the code! A thrilling spy-themed puzzle game. Think fast, your mission awaits!

name: Ancient Relics: Egypt
description: Embark on an Egyptian adventure with Linda and Robert, solving puzzles and restoring a once-thriving village to its former splendor.

name: Magnir Saga Part 1
description: Magnir Saga is an action adventure game. Which our hero was reincarnated as a magic sword man. He will journey across the planet of Magnir to revenge for his father and save the planet.

name: Finger Football: Goal in One + Two
description: Take aim and shoot and these two great finger football games!

name: Hentai Project
description: Uncover the heroines' stories, solve puzzles, and immerse yourself in the beauty of anime images.

name: Distant Worlds 2: Factions - Quameno and Gizureans
description: The Galaxy Expands. The second Distant Worlds 2 expansion brings two new playable factions – the introverted puzzle-solving Quameno and the numberless and ruthless Gizureans.

name: Revenge of Ilcoin
description: In a futuristic sci-fi action setting you will become “The Miner” and your mission will be to take your powerful weapons and protect your Ilcoins (The ultimate treasure in ILCs) from the space aliens pirates and the evil DBoss leader.

name: Escape Simulator: Portal Escape Chamber
description:
Explore the detailed environment of the mysterious subdivision of Aperture Science Laboratories!

Solve perplexing new puzzles and devices, in this content packed escape-room!

Working in a laboratory requires the correct gear! Put on your brand new Aperture Science lab coat and start exploring!

name: Strike Force 3
description: Join Strike Force 3, an elite unit combating ruthless terrorists. Engage in adrenaline-pumping firefights, stealth missions, and complete daring objectives. Enlist now for the ultimate combat experience!

name: Sans Logique
description: Sans Logique is a first-person game that blends puzzle and adventure gameplay. You'll explore different dreamlike worlds, discover the story of your character, and solve some original puzzles.

name: Melvor Idle: Atlas of Discovery
description: Atlas of Discovery, Melvor Idle’s second expansion, is all about exploration! Discover eight new Combat Areas packed with dozens of monsters to fight and hundreds of new items to find. Unlock two new exploration skills, try the all-new Ancient Relics Gamemode… and more!

name: March of Tulpas: Xanadu
description: Lies, delusions, become the light that shines on the truth too. This is a poetic,cute turn-based RPG with a bizarre style that adventuring in a looping world ending in three days.Discover the secrets hidden in the depths that lying all over the breaking world!

name: Path to Knighthood
description: Learn the dark truth behind a gentle wyvern's rampage, a cold-blooded murder, and a dragon-worshiping cult. Will you submit or defy the godlike creature?

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 3: Off-Road DLC
description: Your shift in Autobahn Police Simulator 3 continues - with the new „Off-Road“ DLC!

name: Inverse
description:
The Foundation wanted to advance teleportation technology. What they found was a pathway to a dangerous world beyond our own, and they opened the door to the creatures that inhabit it.
Inverse is played in 4-v-1 matches. Play co-op as the Agents, working together to restore power to the control terminals. Or play solo as the Nul monster, corrupting and incapacitating anyone you can find.

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Promises Made With Her
description: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Promises Made with Her is the third The Quintessential Quintuplets romance visual novel developed by MAGES. The theme this time is “heart-pounding summer vacation dates.” As for what kind of story will unfold this time, more information will be shared in future announcements.

name: Virche Evermore: EpiC:Lycoris
description: Fandisc for Shuuen no Virche -ErroR:salvation-.

name: Red Crucible: Phoenix Rising
description: No prisoners! No mercy! Smash and destroy your way to victory!

name: Fling D'Block
description: A physics based precision time-trial/speedrun game

name: The Secrets of Hope
description: Lose yourself in an immersive story, as you follow a man coming to terms with terminal cancer. Explore a surreal world from a first-person perspective. Revisit both new and old memories and follow along as he discovers The Secrets of Hope.

name: Into the Sky
description: In this first-person puzzle platformer you will try to figure out the right way through each level and afterwards can try to improve your timings by finiding hidden paths and secret short cuts. Your goals are to sucessfully finish a level as well as to beat the fastest time of our level designers.

name: Lempo
description: Find your way back home before Metsänpeitto, an otherworldly plane of existence, consumes you. Lempo is a psychological horror game inspired by Finnish mythology with an emphasis on exploration.

name: Billy Bumbum: A Cheeky Puzzler
description:
Solve challenging puzzles as a cube with a butt. Flip, push and fart your way through colorful levels as you rescue your adorable friends in need. Fart for freedom!

Use seemingly simple mechanics in surprisingly deep and satisfying ways to rescue your friends in over 250 levels.

name: Monster Path
description: A deck building roguelike-JRPG with a 2.5D storybook fantasy art style accompanied by a dynamic score

name: Warstride Challenges
description: Warstride Challenges is a skill based fast FPS, featuring challenging short levels and brutal gunfights. Make use of powers (such as slow-motion) and above all, compete for the first place and improve your skill in over 180 frantic challenges!

name: Final Fantasy VII: Ever Crisis
description:
Final Fantasy VII: Ever Crisis is a mobile game covering the whole FFVII timeline by splitting each story into short chapters focused on important moments using animated cutscenes, some with conversation options, followed by a battle.

Relive the most memorable moments from FFVII and experience the journey of a young hero Sephiroth.

Experience both classic and new stories within the FFVII universe presented in a retro-style look combined with modern, beautifully rendered graphics, that’s easily accessible on the go. Team up your favorite characters and customize each one with iconic gear and weapons to defeat powerful opponents in Solo or Co-op battle mode.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: The Many Pieces of Mr. Coo
description: The Many Pieces of Mr. Coo is a whimsical point’n’click adventure with a surrealist story, astounding hand-drawn animations and hilarious puzzles. Mr. Coo is trapped and broken into pieces. But most of all, he has no idea of what’s going on. Is that a giant chicken over there?

name: Toss!
description: A bananas VR climbing platformer where you play as an acrobatic ape with the strength to swing and toss yourself freely between obstacles in challenging playgrounds.

name: Ghostland
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket League: Season 12 Elite Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: I Have Hired This Anime Girl to Talk to You
description: This visual novel is about you talking to a girl named Claire. That's all.

name: Seven Knights Idle Adventure
description: A new chapter of Seven Knights unfolds! Meet new heroes, as well as familiar faces from other Seven Knights games, and join them on their exciting adventure!

name: Puzzle Journey
description:
"Wild Waters and Earthy Wonders: A Matching Adventure"

Explore the captivating world of land and sea creatures in this thrilling card matching game.
Test your memory and observation skills as you uncover pairs of enchanting images depicting animals from both the wild waters and the earthy wonders.
With four challenging difficulty modes, embark on an adventure filled with fun and discovery.
Match, explore, and win as you unravel the mysteries behind each card.

name: Milky Way Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Embark on a cosmic journey with "Milky Way Jigsaw Puzzles". Solve puzzles featuring stars, galaxies, and celestial wonders while unlocking Steam Achievements. Dive deep into the universe, learn astronomical facts, and connect with fellow puzzle enthusiasts. Your galactic adventure awaits!

name: Milky Way Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: Includes 16 new puzzles, each featuring stunning images of the Milky Way and its celestial wonders. A perfect addition for astronomy enthusiasts and puzzle lovers looking to expand their cosmic journey.

name: Milky Way Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: Includes 16 new puzzles, each featuring stunning images of the Milky Way and its celestial wonders. A perfect addition for astronomy enthusiasts and puzzle lovers looking to expand their cosmic journey.

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws Pack: Invasion of Poland
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: eFootball 2024: Leo Messi Edition
description: Messi, the living legend, is joining your team. Introducing the special boosted edition of "eFootball" - No better time to start playing eFootball than now!

name: Beautiful Sakura: Surfing Club
description: A visual novel focused on mental health and personal identity. Help your character fit into the new city you moved to and find new friends. As part of your journey, you will be able to listen to the people around you and learn to surf for the first time. Player choice affects how the narrative will progress, including special dialogue to discover for key scenes.

name: Rocket League: Season 12
description:
Home to Rocket League’s opening day, Neo Tokyo’s megalithic tech scene and neon-soaked cityscape make for a landmark Arena setting. But fanged rumors lurk amongst the roots of these glittering towers. Notorious hacktivist Zero-Day has gained access to the city's digital infrastructure, and although their motives remain unclear, the city's underbelly buzzes with anticipation of what’s to come.

How will you survive this world of digital disruption? Override your Garage with the Porsche 911 Turbo, go incognito with Rocket Pass rewards, and play Soccer in Zero-Day’s corrupted vision of Neo Tokyo.

Season 12 begins on September 6, no password required!

name: Juicy Retro Style!: Bloodhound
description: Bring the Bloodhound world fully into the retro dimension ️ and enjoy juicy old-style gameplay!

description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Beach Club. Manufactured by Bally in 1953.

description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Rio. Manufactured by United in 1953.

name: Tappump
description:
Tappump is a fast-paced one-button game.

You control the circle. Your goal is to move forward while avoiding mines and staying within the horizontal boundaries of the screen. Press the button to jump, hold the button to increase range. Collect coins to earn points.

If you hit a mine or go beyond the top or bottom of the screen, the game is over.

name: Chital's Mini Adventure
description: Small Indie Platformer that started a Game Jam entry in 2022, now polished a little and released! A Single-Level game where you must collect Jewels and defeat a Boss!

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Pack - German Railway Guns
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Logic Colors
description: Logic Colors is Indie Logic Game in which You move color tiles to solve riddles. Discover rules and relax in 225 unique levels and unlock all items in game! Will You finish them perfectly?

name: The Encounter
description: This game tells the story of a Chinese family who inexplicably disappeared in 1999. Afterwards, a journalist was sent by the TV station to investigate and visit this incident and the subsequent events. The final outcome will be unimaginable to you! Looking forward to your experience!

name: Gulf Echoes: Tent of Treason
description: Embark on a co-op puzzle journey rooted in the Arab gulf region. Grab a friend and unravel tales from the past. You and your partner must bridge time, sharing clues to unveil hidden truths. Solve intricate puzzles from the present to the past.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Italian Tanks
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: French Tanks
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Kriegsmarine
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: HoneyCome Come Come Party
description: Discover the ultimate in character customization. Mold your perfect partner to your exacting specifications, then fall in love—or descend into the deepest depths of carnal desire...

description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Big Time. Manufactured by Bally in 1954.

description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Beauty. Manufactured by Bally in 1952.

description: This is a Bally Bingo Pinball simulation, model model Bikini, manufactured in 1961.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Big Show
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Big Show. Manufactured by Bally in 1956.

description: This is a Bally Bingo Pinball simulation, model Miss America DeLuxe, manufactured in 1977.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Show Time
description: This is a Bally Bingo Pinball simulation, model Show Time, manufactured in 1957.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Big Wheel
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Big Wheel. Manufactured by Bally in 1968.

name: Island
description: Cartoon 3D RPG Board Game, gathering, fighting monsters, exploring and solving puzzles, this world gathers characters from different eras to explore together and defeat the final Boss.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom
description: A collection of 80 Bingo Pinball simulations. Discover why people became addicted to these mysterious machines in the past. 'For amusement only', but used for gambling nevertheless. Too dangerous, so eventually banned in many states. Start right away: Bally Show Time is included, free to use!

name: Raindrop Sprinters
description: Avoid rain, get stars, and run across the passage!

name: Lies as a Starting Point
description: The story revolves around a conversation between the main character Kanata and the main heroine Nozomi on a train. The story branches into three different routes (junior high school, high school and university) by following Nozomi's past. The heroine and protagonist differ depending on the chapter.

name: The Last Hero: Journey to the Unknown
description: In a world dominated by evil, only one hero against many enemies, explore, conquer, and don't give up if you get lost! Help our hero in this platform game in the fight against the forces of evil.

name: Plunder Islands
description: A fast paced 2D platformer, Plunder Islands has you running, jumping and climbing for treasure. Are you ready for the challenges each island brings.

name: Chillquarium
description: Chillquarium is a relaxing idle game. Buy fish and raise them in real time, then sell them to turn a profit! Customize your aquarium and fill your collection with rare exotic fish, and unlock ultra-rare color variants!

name: Tonalities
description: A mix of problem solving and skill. Tonalities is a 2D puzzle game where you solve levels using the power of physics whilst enjoying a reactive and ambient sound track. Position your pieces, find your zen, and enjoy over 50 levels of challenge.

name: Clash of Panzer
description: Select your tank, armored vehicle or helicopter. Experience fast pace modern warfare!

name: No Son of Mine
description: No Son of Mine is a survival horror game focused on combat, stealth, exploration, puzzle solving and uncovering a gruesome mystery. Your job is to find the truth, before he finds you. You will be hunted. You will be terrorized. Can you survive?

name: Starfield
description: In this next generation role-playing game set amongst the stars, create any character you want and explore with unparalleled freedom as you embark on an epic journey to answer humanity’s greatest mystery.

name: Trilogi Keluarga Bahagia Side Story: Yuni dan Puzzle Ajaib
description:
Yuni has been separated from her mother and older sister since she was 7 years old.
One day, she finds a magical puzzle piece that can grant her wish.
But to make this happen, Yuni must take all the pieces from those around her; Rio is a delinquent, Haryanto is smart, and Benjamin is kind.
Can Yuni put all the pieces together and make her dream come true?

name: An Adventure and a Half
description: A mini hack of Super Mario 64 containing one stage with one and a half stars to collect.

name: Witch Tower: Flash
description: Witch Tower: Flash is a pixel-art tower defense game featuring RPG and roguelike mechanics.

name: Undying Memoir
description:
Undying Memoir is a platforming game with unlockable lore.
This is a fangame based on Touhou Project.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Superb Edition
description:
Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create YOUR OWN illustrations.

Pick one of over a dozen drawings and make it your own. Chose one of the available settings and play around with these adorable characters.

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

name: Hentai Stars: Demoness Ayame
description: Dive into the world of hentai stars and meet new Ayame in her demoness look.

name: Hentai Stars: Idol Tsubaki
description: Dive into the world of hentai stars and meet new Tsubaki in her idol look.

name: Hentai Stars: Night Rider Ran
description: Dive into the world of hentai stars and meet new Ran in her night rider look.

description: In this bundle, you will meet student Sayuri and Nanami in her new puppy look.

name: Hentai Stars: Deluxe Edition
description: This bundle includes Demoness Ayame DLC.

name: Strikers1945: RE
description:
Strikers1945: RE, an officially licensed vertical-scrolling shooter game, is here.
Become the leading character of the special force, "Strikers"!
Experience the thrill of defeating enemies, just like in the original plane shooter game, Strikers 1945!

name: Mr. Platformer
description: Run! Jump? Swim?! Mr. Platformer can do it all!

name: Life's 2 Short: Unhooked

name: Pinocchio: Interactive Book

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Starlet
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Starlet. Manufactured by United in 1955.

name: Star Realms: High Alert - Heroes

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Another Episode Pack
description: This content requires the base game Rune Factory 3 Special on Steam in order to play.

name: 4D:XD
description: 4D:XD is a top-down 2D bullet hell space shooter. Conquer the game with as few deaths as possible!

name: Just Fighting
description: Just Fighting is an exhilarating survival game that plunges players into a post-apocalyptic world infested with hordes of bloodthirsty zombies. Developed for adrenaline junkies and strategic thinkers, this game offers a unique and immersive experience like no other.

name: Possibly Endless Golf
description: Embark on a cozy golfing journey with Possibly Endless Golf. Enjoy this minimalist game in bite-sized chunks or endless rounds. No pressure, no scores, just you and the fairways. Perfect for a quick escape or a relaxing retreat. Your tranquil golfing experience awaits. Tee off today!

name: Task Control
description: Task control is a 2D platformer with action elements. You have to play as a special agent and destroy enemies on the level, moving around the locations. Your goal: Destroy the maximum number of enemies and complete the level. First aid kits and grenades will always come to your aid!

name: Room Cleaning
description: Room cleaning - addictive game to help you relax. You are only hiring and offering a solution for cleaning dirt, stains and waste disposal and offer it in perfect order! use all available items that can be used in your task!

name: Slum Musketeer
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Go through many levels, find out what happened to the teacher. Overcome various traps, fight enemies with swords, and also destroy bosses! Find a way to bring it back!

name: Lost in Fantasy
description: Lost in fantasy - 2D platformer with RPG elements. You will go through different levels as you progress through the story of the game! Create your character, equip it with the necessary weapons and go to battle! Go to a wonderful world, explore it, and most importantly, beware of dangerous enemies!

name: Lost Puzzle: City
description: Lost Puzzle: City is a 3D puzzle game in which you will have to place some items from the list where they belong. Look for clues in the environment, scrutinize every street and don't forget: it's not as easy as it seems at first sight!

name: Sorrow Asylum 2
description: Sorrow Asylum 2 is a looping horror game, a mix of an abandoned asylum and your mind's prison, as well as a sequel to Sorrow Asylum.

name: The Hallway: Escape Room
description: “The Hallway - Escape Room” is a story-based single player puzzle adventure game that will take you on a mind-bending journey to uncover the mysteries of a long-forgotten civilization and their gods discovered during an expedition. Will you face them?

name: Egg Drop
description: Flutter around to dodge falling eggs from chickens above, and collect corn and power ups to drop eggs on the unlucky fowl below!

name: Resident Fear: Redistribution
description: Step into the heart of fear in 'Resident Fear: Redistribution.' Survive the undead, solve puzzles, and unveil the sinister in this gripping horror adventure by Gamesoft Studio. Dare to play?

name: Warzoom
description: Warzoom A Game Of Dynamic Strategy is a fantastic game that's easy to learn and loads of fun to play! It's a tit-for-tat with no two games ever alike. Non stop action from the beginning to the end. Prepare for battle!

name: Street Stallion: The Jaywalk Simulator
description: Jaywalk Simulator! Take control of the Street Stallion, who must dodge incoming Obstacles and jaywalk himself to be finally united with a herd of horses. Test your reflexes with its challenging gameplay. Can you beat the game and become the ultimate jaywalking champion?

name: Yujiro's Mansion
description: As a thief who does his job well, you stumble across a mansion. What you didn't know was that this mansion belonged to the "Strongest Creature In The World", Yujiro Hanma. Can you rob Yujiro's Mansion and get out alive?

name: 2099 Gravity Havoc
description: Shoot at enemies in a WEIGHTLESS space station to save yourself from burning alive in the atmosphere!

name: Super Spooky Subgame Spectacular
description: Plunge into a realm of spine-tingling delights, where ghoulish subgames beckon! Embrace frightful fun in the Super Spooky Subgame Spectacular!

name: Vahluna Corp.
description: Confront the alien invaders head-on, but risk dwindling ammo and their sharpshooting abilities, or take the stealthy path, sneaking around, and seeking hidden vents and passageways to outmaneuver his enemies.

name: Forest Adventure
description: The little girl's favorite handkerchief was taken away by a wolf. In order to get her handkerchief back, the girl who has no fighting ability decided to follow the wolf to the mountain.

name: AstroMania
description:
Become the greatest alien-destroying robot the world has seen...

After Earth is overrun and invaded by an alien race, there’s only one robot who can fight back. Armed to the wires with an upgradable arsenal of guns and weapons, your job is to take back planet Earth, one bullet at a time.

name: The Castle
description: Do you enjoy listening to stories and having the ability to influence their unfolding? If so, then immerse yourself in the role of an active participant as you join Yaren on her quest for freedom.

name: Snake Farm
description: A top-down action roguelike about buying snakes, fighting them, selling their oil, and buying more snakes. Upgrade your weapons, get stronger snakes to fight, and chase down a high score with only ten days to live.

name: True Virus
description: True Virus is a point-and-click adventure game that takes players to an abandoned psychiatric hospital. Set in a world ravaged by an enigmatic and dangerous pandemic.

name: Picket Line
description: Picket Line is a casual single-player tower defense game that tells the story of a factory strike in 20th century Europe. Players act as the Union by controlling the workers who form a picket line. The goal of the game is to block any potential workers who want to enter the factory to keep it working (popularly known as Scabs), and to hold the strike long enough until the factory gives up and accepts the Union's terms.

name: Raiding.Zone
description: Raiding.Zone​ is a pve arena game inspired by World of Warcraft and Warframe. The gameplay is oriented around the roles Tank, Healer and Damage-Dealer.

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Golden Memories Edition
description:
Rune Factory 3 Special “Golden Memories Edition” includes the following content:

Custom outer box featuring an original illustration based on the game’s anime opening
Rune Factory 3 Special Switch game card and case
An acrylic standee featuring protagonists from Rune Factory 3 Special, Rune Factory 4 Special, and Rune Factory 5 measuring six inches wide and four inches tall
An original soundtrack CD
A custom five-by-eight inches planner containing in-game seasons in addition to a real world calendar
Exclusive downloadable content “Swimsuit Mode” allowing for characters to appear in their swimsuits year-round

name: Witchcraft: Candy Hunt
description: Witchcraft: Candy Hunt is an old-school shooter game with charming pixel art graphics that will take you on a Halloween adventure. Fly on a broomstick and battle your way through three exciting levels, each one featuring unique spooky creatures such as pumpkin monsters, evil crows and ghosts.

name: The Keyper
description: A new caretaker in an old, mysterious building. Collect keys and unlock the secrets beneath.

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Limited Edition
description: The Limited Edition, avaliable only in Europe, includes a 140-page A5 notebook, character stickers, Micah themed pin badges, a woven patch, an A3 poster, plus access to the in-game “Swimsuit Mode” allowing for characters to appear in their swimsuits year-round, all housed in a custom outer box featuring an original Rune Factory 3 Special illustration inspired by the game’s anime opening.

name: Raiding Zone
description: No Grind just Raiding.

name: Shalnor Legends 2: Trials of Thunder
description: A Story-Rich RPG/Action-Adventure Game. Step into the shoes of the young Orc Mogren, and explore all of Thunder Island. Venture into dangerous dungeons, explore caves and solve puzzles and help the residents of the island with their quests.

name: Doink!
description: A paddle game for the Playdate

name: Orbital Cargo Division
description: The crew of a cargo ship arrives at what appears to be an abandoned space station. Power appears to be there, but no one is responding to their radio messages. A pixel art point of click adventure with an exciting story and lots of humor.

name: Voyager 2
description: Launch the Voyager space probe to the furthest depths of the Solar System! Use gravity to slingshot around planets and scan, orbit, or land on targets to earn stunning replays of your accomplishments.

name: Fitness VR
description: Fitness VR is the ideal solution for mixing video games and sustained physical activities. Enter the Fitness VR Club as you go to the gym, and sweat your muscles to wake them up and strengthen them!

name: Chants of Sennaar
description: In this game of adventure and enigmas where ancient languages are both the lock and the key, travel the endless steps of a prodigious labyrinth, multiply unexpected encounters and unveil the mysteries of a fantastic world inspired by the myth of Babel.

name: Abriss: Build to Destroy
description: Abriss is an atmospheric physics-destruction building game. Build structures from parts to let them crash into your targets. Unlock new parts, destroy more, witness entropy at its worst in digital-brutalist cityscapes. Build to destroy.

name: Girl Genius: Adventures in Castle Heterodyne
description: A fabulous Action Adventure game based on the award winning graphic novel series Girl Genius by Phil & Kaja Foglio.

name: Enchanted Portals
description: Bobby and Penny, rookie magicians, enter an adventure to get back to their dimension and retrieve the Magic Book in Enchanted Portals, a co-op 2D platformer.

name: The Adventure Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite: Extinction Code Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Asterix: Hunt for the Boars
description: A digital simulator of the handheld game of the same name.

name: Let's Hide the Body! (Tee-hee~)
description:
This is a simple decorating game but with a little twist.

Features:
* Cartoonish blood and very funny dead body!
* MC Paint aesthetic you probably missed... did you not?
* Technically there's still a cute boy in the corner, so you know... additional points, right??
* Around 40 objects to decorate with.
* Guilty fishb

name: Grimace vs. Skibidi
description: Help Grimace stop the tennis balls fired by Skibidi Toilet. It takes speed and precision, make one mistake and you’re out!

name: Golden Sun QOL
description:
This mod implements the Quality-of-Life features used in Dawn of Djinn in a setting that better reflects the original game. For players who wish to experience the original world of Golden Sun with those features.

Adjustments to Overworld Abilities/Quality of Life Updates:

Retreat not only warps you to the start of a dungeon or town but now functions similarly to teleport when used on the world map. Using Retreat pulls up the map and you can select any town that you’ve previously visited to instantly return there. The linearity of Golden Sun doesn’t make this as needed as other RPGs, but it does open up some options that would be unreasonable in the original game, such as Retreating back to Imil to restock on Hermes Water.

Avoid now behaves as a random encounter toggle rather than a wear off effect. Using it once turns off 100% of random encounters, using it again turns them back on.

Default Psynergy:

Building off the built in Psynergy the Randomizer provided, many utility Psynergy like Growth, Whirlwind, and even Avoid are built right into party members so they have them, regardless of your class. In addition, Psynergy not tied to battle no longer cost Psynergy to use. Though they have different names to distinguish from their battle equivalents. For example in battle Growth still cost Psynergy to use, but outside of battle it is refer to as “Sprout” but otherwise functions the same.

Psynergy Items:

Psynergy items also behave differently as well. Often when you first encounter them they won’t be items, but rather weapons and armor you can equip to party members to get the effect without wasting an extra item slot. When the equipment becomes out-classed, you can sell it at a shop and a more traditional Psynergy item will appear in any item shop’s Artifact section.

name: Immortality Paradox
description: Immortality Paradox is a Touhou secondary game.

name: Grinlox is here
description:
You want to go to work, but a nasty surprise awaits you there.
This game was created with GameGuru MAX.

name: Hansel and Gretel: Interactive Book
description: Hansel and Gretel. Interactive classic stories that always surprise you.

name: Pigs Can Fly
description: Crank your Playdate to fly as a pig, but avoid the birds or it's game over. A simple arcade game made in one day.

name: Beullokgwa Miyeonsiwa Godae Geuriseu
description: A chaotic educational game set in ancient Greece!Become the fictional philosopher Epistemonos and defeat the scholars who stand in your way!Drag blocks to merge them and defeat the enemies.Immerse yourself in a topsy-turvy story set in ancient Greece, with a focus on the Acropolis.

name: CyberPigeon
description: Take control of CyberPigeon, the ultimate cybernetic avian warrior, as you engage in intense battles against swarming drones and formidable bosses. Adapt to the ever-changing environment, collect power-ups and weapons, and rise to the top of the leaderboard in this thrilling aerial showdown.

name: Stories One
description: Welcome to Stories One: an exciting pre-alpha game blending FPS and MOBA genres. Embark on thrilling 5v5 battles in a 90's retro-futuristic city. Strategically build your deck, level up, and conquer your foes. Join the Stories One arena today!

name: Chinese Pope Door
description: This is a role-playing game where the player can fight freely with the enemies. You can run and jump freely, use sword and dart to attack the enemies, and special attack to give the enemies a heavy blow. If you like Super Mario's style of operation, you must try this game.

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 5
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki at the office getting cornered by her asshole of a Boss, then seduced into a wild quickie while her husband is on the other side of a glass wall.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Seychelles XP
description: The Seychelles are a group of islands in the Indian Ocean - but what comes into most people’s minds when they think about the name is a tropical paradise, luxurious holidays, excellent diving spots and breathtakingly beautiful nature.

name: Destroy Korcity
description: Tower shooting game with cool music and endless enemies

name: Cat Apartment
description: Cat Apartment is a 2.5D, swivel, find gameplay, dynamic cat hunt game where you need to take care of all the cats in the apartment. Find cute cats hidden in a relaxing apartment.

name: Agriculture Tractor Sim
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating realm of agriculture with "Agriculture Tractor Sim"

name: Only Up!
description: Have you ever wanted to walk through the peaks and have an eagle vision? To fly over the world like a God ! Embark on an exciting journey in Only UP: Rising ! Play as a lost pirate on an island sheltering the ruins of a Lost City in the middle of the Pacific !

name: Meet Her There
description: An intense, intimate narrative game in 2 colors. Explore a tiny, giant world of two people, stuck in a cursed time loop. Relive a single day as many times as needed. Ask for help. Don't get arrested. Find the correct steps to try and save the person you love. Is it not too late?

name: Des Racines et des Graines
description: A garden game where you will explore a calm and peaceful island. You will gather some seeds from the vegetation and re-plant them close to each other to get hybrids. Day after day, you will cross-breed the plants to create some new ones, to finally find and restore the ultimate tree: Yggdrasil.

name: Geko: In Search of the Big Fly
description: Geko is a friendly gecko with a delightful goal: catching the big fly to ensure a delicious meal! To help him on this thrilling adventure, you'll jump, climb platforms, dodge obstacles, and defeat enemies that appear along the way.

name: Last Wish
description: "Last Wish" tells about a girl Chris, all of whose wishes begin to come true. But with maximum cruelty. Magic? Or do those who started the game have names? To find out, Chris will have to play by someone else's rules - make wishes again and again.

name: Le Bonk: Academic Version
description: Imagine, you are a mole armed with a hammer, battling creatures coming out of holes by throwing your hammer to knock them off the stage. Dig into the environment to avoid hammers and use speed to dash into opponents for a powerful knockback. Be the last one standing and Bonk!

name: Highrise City
description: Highrise City is the next evolution of City Builders. Create cities with up to a million inhabitants where more than 30.000 buildings are placed and where countless people are walking down the streets.

name: Pathogenesis: Overcome
description: Hardcore story-driven Action RPG about those who survived after a global pandemic on the territory of Leningradskaya Oblast, Russia. A story about finding your place in a destroyed world, where the greatest danger does not come from the infected.

name: Arachne's Stone
description: Arachne's Stone is a horror RPG Maker game about the backstory of a strange lad who wants to steal the "Wishing Jewel" from a house owned by the hungry arachne. There are seven endings, and you must clear them all to unlock the epilogue.

name: Detective Pomu and the Tatsuki Manor Mystery
description: Join Detective Pomu as she tracks down the elusive Phantom Thief Selen Tatsuki to her Mystery Manor to save the poor missing Mascots. Solve puzzles, collect cute mascots, and most of all have fun with your oshi! Can Detective Pomu unravel the Mystery of Tatsuki Manor and save the Mascots in time?

name: Skibidi Toilet India
description: You have to eliminate an army of walking toilets. To accomplish this task, you will have access to a variety of weapons. Additionally, there is a titan boss in the game who is the leader of the toilet army, and you must defeat him to win the game. So, get ready with your weapons!

name: Girlfriend Guide
description: Girlfriend Guide is a boys-love romantic comedy visual novel about finding true love, failing miserably to do so and making friends along the way.

name: Super Huggie Bros
description: Enter in the Super Huggie Bros world facing the mysterious islands, jump and run over the obstacles, and fight against super evil monsters to find his treasure at the final destination in a dangerous world. Complete all levels, collect coins and destroy every block to find the keys and open the gates.

name: Amalgamation
description: 5 speedmapped short maps inspired by wads like Autophagy, Speed of Doom, Surge, Claustrophobia 1024 etc.

name: Villa de la Muerte
description: This was a map originally made for a vaguely spain/syringe inspired project but, decided after some time to release on its own.

name: All Alone
description: A missing father, a mysterious murder, paintings depicting missing children. Horror game in which the protagonist, who has lost his memory, is forced to get to a horrific truth. Who in the world are you?

name: The Last Exodus
description: Turn-based tactical strategy with massive capital ships, frigates, gunships and fighter squads. Gather resources, research technologies, design and expand your fleet. Destroy your enemies. Single player and multi player mode, hot seat mod also available.

name: Nexus
description: Nexus is a third person MOBA play-to-earn shooter. Craft a wide variety of weapons, abilities and equipment to build your own custom character. Defend your NEXUS at all costs and ruthlessly destroy your enemies in fast paced 5v5 MOBA action built on Unreal Engine 5. Equip abilities in your loadout and swap between them to adapt to your opponents and your team’s needs. This is a tournament game which will have ZERO pay-to-win elements.

name: Terror in the Kitchen
description: This is a first person atmospheric horror game. The style of the game is influenced by old graphics trend (PSX games etc). You play as a part timer in a restaurant. You wash dishes, take out trash, pump the toilets and organize the table tops.

name: DuckWorld Revive
description:
DuckWorld Revive is an online world full of exciting, funny and enlightening games with Donald Duck and other familiar Duckburg characters.

With over twenty 3D mini-games, Donald Duck Weekly ensures that your child, as a true citizen of Duckburg, can play in a safe, responsible and rich game environment.
